attributes.long-description:
Download this truly experimental collection on PS4® from Sony’s Santa Monica Studio.

Datura
From Plastic Group, the creator of the innovative Linger in Shadows and Bound, Datura is a form of interactive play that will immerse you in a unique gaming experience. Explore the nature of consequence. What is right, and what is wrong? That is for you to decide...

.detuned
.detuned is a personalized, interactive music experience which gives you the opportunity to create dynamic artwork in real-time to accompany your XMB™ music collection. Change and tweak your own music to accompany the scene. Developed by .theprodukkt, .detuned is a brilliantly designed, one-of-a-kind experience.

Linger in Shadows
Dive into the world of Linger in Shadows, where a dark and mysterious creature lingers in the shadows, protecting the ancient Temple on its high perch above the ruined city below. Linger in Shadows is not a game, but rather an experiment into the realm of interactive digital art.



Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Datura is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Plastic/Santa Monica Studio. © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. Developed by .theprodukkt. Linger in Shadows is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. © 2008 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.
attributes.name: The Experimental Bundle
